Jobs are fun 17 Aug 2009

Especially Linux jobs. I found these graphs to be rather interesting.



First, the number of Linux-related jobs is growing much faster than Windows-related ones:








linux, windows Job Trendslinux jobs - windows jobs







Second, they pay a lot better:












windows $60,000


linux $86,000




View Larger Salary Graph





And of course I've got to throw embedded linux and robotics in the mix:


















windows $60,000


linux $86,000


embedded linux $90,000


robotics $79,000




View Larger Salary Graph
